properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TYRRHENIAN SEA.
SARDINIA-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, POSSIBLE PERSONS ON BOARD, CAPSIZED
AND ADRIFT IN 38-40N 008-52E AT 210900Z MAY.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
